about_the_game:
Thousands of light years in deep space.

Awoken to the sounds of alarms, your ship is failing.

You haven't made it home.

Out of the window is a large group of ships. Maybe they can provide help?

Journey through a graveyard of derelict spaceships, harvesting what you can and try figure out why exactly they've been abandoned.

Gameplay

Scan the various ships near you and locate the most important parts to salvage and venture inside. Which systems repair will you prioritise? Artificial gravity, water filtration, or engines?

Be careful where you step, as these ships may not be as abandoned as you thought. Observe ... or run, the choice is yours. Hopefully you make the right one.

Find instructions manuals on each ship and follow them carefully to remove the parts you need - or it may just be the last thing you do.

Story

After finishing her last salvage mission, Jordan entered cryosleep to begin the long journey back to Earth.

Waking to blaring alarms, her ship is in disrepair. Find out why you've been brought to this graveyard of starships, why they're here, how long you were really asleep, and if there's still a home to go back to.

Features

  • A horror focused, dark and foreboding journey through deep space.

  • Explore multiple derelict spaceships, each with a unique entity on board. Friend, or foe?

  • Uncover the reasons the ships have ended up here, and why you too have suffered this fate.

  • Find a way home ... how long has it been? Is there still a home to go back to?

  • Solve puzzles to remove the parts you need. A wrong move may be *shocking*.

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes containing blood and offensive language.
